name: 8 Floors Escape Games - start a brain challenge
name_original: 8 Floors Escape Games - start a brain challenge
description:
Welcome to 8 Floors Escape Games - a cool escape game!

Do you think you have the skills with 8 Floors Escape Games - a cool escape game?

Escape Game: 8 Floors is another point and click escape game. There are eight floors in this floor escape game. You need to move from one floor to another while collecting required items in order to escape from the eight floor by unlocking the door. Have fun!

8 Floors is a new point and click escape game for your everyday fun and excitement! Living on the 8th floor of your apartment brings in great vibes even though climbing each and everyday on the same flight of stairs gives your feet and hamstrings some daily punishment! One weird morning, you noticed a note on your door that says, you are the only one in the building and a hope for escape is futile! What could this mean!? And the note wasn’t lying at all! All of the emergency exits are barred down and the only way to get-off this building is solving it through each and every floor until you reach ground! Do this so before something else happens! Good luck!


Game features:

• Genuine story!
• Innovative puzzles!
• Stunning graphics!
• Realistic atmosphere!
• Tricky and challenging puzzles!
• Gorgeous graphics !
• No signup's required, just download and install!

Enjoy this fun adventure escape game!
